pageContext.claim: “I view him [John Bolton] as a disgruntled employee. Very unhappy. Hated to leave. He was basically a man who was not happy to be leaving. Was not happy to be leaving. He had a lot of policy disputes, he and I.”
pageContext.analysis: Bolton insists that he resigned. We have little reason to doubt Bolton's account, given Trump is often loath to fire people in person.
